abstract: Arena Players Repertory Theater in East Farmingdale has moved to new, smaller quarters at the Vanderbilt Museum in Centerport, which is presenting the first Long Island production of Yasmina Reza play God of Carnage through Nov 9 (Metropolitan/Long Island).
snippet: The Arena Players Repertory Theater in East Farmingdale has moved to new, smaller quarters at the Vanderbilt Museum in Centerport.
lead_paragraph: The Arena Players Repertory Theater in East Farmingdale has moved to new, smaller quarters at the Vanderbilt Museum in Centerport.

headline.main: A Final Curtain, but More Opening Ones Are Ahead
headline.print_headline: A Final Curtain, but More Opening Ones Are Ahead
headline.seo: Arena Players Repertory Theater Gets New Home
